Steve Miller Band - Wikipedia
s: April 13, 2025 - The Steve Miller Band is an American rock band formed in San Francisco, California in 1966. The band is led by Steve Miller on guitar and lead vocals. The group had a string of mid- to late-1970s hit singles that are staples of classic rock radio, as well as several earlier psychedelic rock albums.

s: November 17, 2018 - Steve Miller was a mainstay of the San Francisco music scene that upended American culture in the late ’60s.
